title: Pol Auth in Iran and UK

content.question: Which of the following statements is true about the source of political authority in Nigeria and the United Kingdom?

choices.label: Both countries substantiate their political authority through religious authority and symbolism.
Both countries substantiate their political authority through unwritten constitutions.
Both countries substantiate their political authority by relying on popular elections.
Both countries substantiate their political authority by relying on federal systems of government.

content.answer: Both countries substantiate their political authority by relying on popular elections.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the implications of the similarities and differences between countries with similar political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
